articles.description: To celebrate the release of Pokémon Legends: Z-A, Pokémon GO is hosting a special limited-time event from October 16, 2025 to October 20, 2025. This guide lists all the bonuses, research, and raids and more you can encounter during the Pokémon Legends: Z-A ev…
articles.content:
Starts
Thursday, October 16, 2025, at 
 10:00 AM Local Time
Ends
Monday, October 20, 2025, at 
 8:00 PM Local Time
